original_title: Charlie Chaplin, le génie de la liberté
overview: The whole world knows him. Burlesque comedy genius, popular actor, author, director, producer, composer, choreographer, Charlie Chaplin (1899-1977) used his talent to serve an ideal of justice and freedom. But his best scenario was his own destiny, a story written into the political and artistic history of the 20th century.
tagline: Timeless, universal, fascinating: a portrait of a historical emblem
title: Charlie Chaplin, The Genius of Liberty
